## Load Data
```{r load data}
dat <- readRDS("/Volumes/HiWi_Data/DATA/matched_hashtags_data.rds")
```


```{r}
test <- dat %>%
  mutate(
    charachters = str_extract_all(text, "")
  )

test %>%
  sample_n(1000) %>%
  select(text, charachters) %>%
  mutate(
    unicodes = str_extract_all(text, "[^[:ascii:]äÄüÜöÖß]")
  ) %>%
  View.tweets()
```

```{r}
test %>%
  select(text, charachters) %>%
  sample_n(10000) %>%
  filter(str_detect(text, "[^[:ascii:]]")) %>%
  View.tweets()
```

```{r}
var <- "retweet_count"
FUN <- mean

FUN(pull(dat[dat$has_biologie == 1, var]))




```
